Reviews.Content: walk st peters sq vatican dei consoli convenient tourist got around town hop sightseeing bus stopped entry st peters sq metro away 50 stated web side like 700 hotel four stars appears modest reception desk bottom case 4 stars expected impressive reception bustling atmosphere roof terrace pleasant flowers empty except breakfast breakfast ok modest selection fresh fruit except basket oranges breakfast would expect 4 star hotel pleasant helpful staff rooms clean small room desk chair relax tv set tiny 15 old fashioned free internet certainly expected beds hard duvet missing rather looking pillows hard heavy got asked couple pillows got slight improvement tiny bathroom good towels good water pressure dirty emergency shower gave impression slow elevator noisy street ask room high towards back street safe room small camera ipad

Reviews.Title: “Consoli still our favorite hotel in Rome.”
Reviews.Author: thosetwo
Reviews.Content: disappointed hotel stayed 5 different hotels trip italy far disappointing room small couldnt even walk around bed small suitcase ground one front desk couldnt speak enough english answer simple questions bed even get made towels delivered 2nd day requested late evening 5 hotels offer free wifi pay wifi connection incredibly slow took 510 minutes open email account page hotel photos charming hotel beautiful view none didnt even view roof top terrace buildings side

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, lovely hotel”

Reviews.Title: “Delightfull, clean and convenient location for a lovely stay in Rome!”

Reviews.Content: weve stayed many times written couple reviews second visit 2010 still quite happy consoli staff friendly helpful speak english despite claim earlier reviewer rooms small typically european comfortable clean matter size breakfast good choices cereal fruit yogurt meat cheese bread scrambled eggs lovely roof terrace makes excellent cappuccino location great busy day quiet night enough good restaurants gelato stores nearby also close subway bus lines highly recommend especially rates lower

greeted fabrizio nice quite helpful went room first floor room small although booked deluxe room however linens fabulous bed comforter absolutely clean room clean closet wonderful ac worked almost curtain one day maid forget leave face towels wasnt big deal yes tv 13 tv much time one really spend room something rome day night problem sleeping night yes beds hard another european quality slept Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Wonderful”

Reviews.Content: hotel great location close st peters clean nice staff always willing help breakfast plus great atmosphere rooftop terrace excellent super service given choice two different rooms corner room bit space bathroom area tight especially shower excellent water pressure luxury bath towels made forget tight space location made easy access shopping vatican metro subway buses booked thru expedia using shuttle service airport excellent time would recommend hotel dei consoli anyone coming rome looking great place stay thank staff enjoyable stay

Reviews.Content: wife sister law husband three year old son returned enjoyable stay hotel dei consoli boutique hotel small reception rest hotel first class beautiful rooms linen towels changed every day superb air conditioning ideal cool heat rome breakfast served roof patio excellent views city position hotel ideal visiting vatican around corner reception staff helpful providing map visiting rest city emailed hotel advance sent pick us take us back airport 65 euro way cheaper excellent value bearing mind 5 party would definitely recommend hotel anyone visiting rome although first visit intend return definitely stay consoli
